then.line: I know! You're a flashlight!
I think you will find that I said "With no light..."
Exactly! That's when you need a flash light the most! When there's no light.
...Right?
Hmm.
I acknowledge your answer. The prophecy grows clearer.
Can you just tell me where Minty is?
We are nearly at our end.
Fine okay.
The roundness of my shape...is only equalled by the smoothness of my edges.
WHAT AM I?!
You must be...
The eyes of a parent looking lovingly at their child?
You think the eyes of a parent shine bright with no light...
And that you must squint your eyes before their might?
Maybe? Yung Sphinx, I really need to find Minty.
Your answer is acknowledged. The prophecy grows.
Okay...
The roundness of my shape...is only equalled by the smoothness of my edges.
WHAT AM I?!
Oh, I know this one!
You're the colours of an ancient rainbow, reverberating through time and space!
I got it didn't I?
Your answer is acknowledged. Another layer to the prophecy has been--
No, but wait. I got it right, right?
You submitted a response and it has been accepted into--
No, but I'm RIGHT. LIke that was the right answer?
It is an answer.
But--
The roundness of my shape...is only equalled by the smoothness of my edges.
WHAT AM I?!
